title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 5, ch. XIV, pt. 144 - Statewide Certification Program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 5, ch. XIV, pt. 144 - Statewide Certification Program

State Regulations
§ 144.1 - Purpose and general description
§ 144.2 - Certification criteria
§ 144.3 - Submission of an application
§ 144.4 - Revocation of certification as a minority or women-owned business enterprise
§ 144.5 - Criteria for acceptance of federal certification in lieu of completing and submitting the New York State minority and women-owned business enterprise certification application
§ 144.6 - Criteria for acceptance of New York municipal certification in lieu of completing and submitting the New York State minority and women-owned business enterprise certification application
§ 144.7 - Criteria for acceptance of DD Form 214 by the United States department of defense in lieu of other documents as proof of race or ethnicity and certain personal information of an applicant for purposes of certification of the applicant's business as a minority-owned business
§ 144.8 - Criteria for acceptance of New York municipal certification in lieu of completing and submitting the New York state minority- and women-owned business enterprise certification application
§ 144.9 to 144.10 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 5, ch. XIV, pt. 144

Statutory authority: Executive Law, §§ 313[2], [2-a], 313-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
